department: College of Computing and Digital Media
biography: Visiting Associate Professor, most recently held the post of Chairman of the Computer Sciences Department at Amman University in Jordan.  He has also held teaching positions at New York Institute of Technology, Al al-Bayt University, the Arab Academy for Financial and Banking Studies, Jordan University for Women, and Al-Asra University, all in Jordan.  Dr. El-Zayyat earned his doctorate in electrical enginerring from the University of Nevada at Reno, and his masters and bachelor degrees in electrical engineering from Northrop University in California.  His area of specialization is routing algorithms.
